affected_services: Third party email client programs such as Outlook and MacMail
76507.summary: Some customers Nationally are experiencing errors when using third party email programs such as Outlook when accessing Shaw.ca email addresses. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
76507.title: May 12 - Nationally | Third Party Email Clients - Outage (Fix In Progress)
